InflationRate.name: InflationRate
InflationRate.description: Represents the inflation rates that are used to adjust currency values from one year to another.

CalendarYear.description: The year in which this inflation rate is valid.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency for this inflation rate record.

DataSource.description: The data source from where the inflation rate was obtained.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the inflation rate.

InflationRate.description: The annual inflation rate thatâ€™s used to convert currency values. This rate is calculated based on the difference in the average consumer price index between the previous year and the current year.

InflationRateUnqKeyIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the inflation rate in the currency-calendar year format. This field is unique within your organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the inflation rate record is locked from dataset updates.
